page.title: 16HOUSING IN THE SOUTH HAMS
page.content: These houses were built in the 1950's. The only new houses being built in the area at present are at a luxury development at Membland where a few very expensive (around Â£95,000), detatched architect designed houses are now on the market.This is very unusual in this area because the land here is for prime agricultural use and permission for building is not granted very often. Although house prices are generally high in the south west,in the South Hams they are particularly expensive.This is because more and more people are moving here and commuting to work,or buying houses as holiday homes.There is very little rented accommodation,though some winter lets are available.
